name: Rules and regulations Law Journals and Reviews Hawaii's General Excise Tax Law:  A Comprehensive Review of the Decisions.  II HBJ No. 13, at pg. 1.
text:
Rules and regulations.  The director of taxation may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations to carry out the purposes of this chapter. [L 1965, c 155, pt of §2; Supp, §119-16; HRS ]  Cross References

  Rules, see chapter 91.
